name: ASCII Game Series: Pinball
description:
Enjoy the long forgotten minimalistic retro game concept with relaxing music.
It is a retro arcade game featuring simple two-dimensional ASCII graphics and was inspired by original games of 80's.


The game consists of a ball continuously moving on a screen.
The flippers are one or more small controlled levers used for redirecting the ball up the playfield. They are the main control that the player has over the ball..

The primary objective of the game is to score as many points as possible.Features:
  • classic game concept
  • retro ASCII graphic style
  • ambient music
  • 5000 Steam achievements
